title: WIHOLL Women's Summer Sleeveless Boat Neck Mini Dress Slim Fit Party Club Bodycon Dresses
description: Size Guide: XS= 2-4, S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18, XXL=US 20-22. Summer Mini Dress For Women Is Made Of High-Quality Fabric, Super Soft, Stretchy And Comfy Against The Skin.

Clothing Care: Machine Or Hand Wash With Cold Water/Hang Or Line Dry/No Bleach/No Dry Clean/Warm Iron If Needed.Please Refer To The Wiholl Size Chart Before Ordering. For Any Other Questions, Please Feel Free To Contact Us Anytime!
